1.name: zakayo1
1.description: The 54-year old male chimpanzee popularly known as Zakayo, who has lived at Uganda Wildlife Conservation Education Centre (UWEC) in Entebbe for 42 years is dead. Zakayo was the oldest known captive chimpanzee in the country.

6.name: rhino1
6.description: the rhino are one of the species at risk of extiction, if not protected, we risk loosing the entire generation of rhino species
